meta.model_name: Costco Germany 2026 Market Entry Simulation Engine

regulatory_environment.requirement: Ban generic environmental claims without recognized excellent environmental performance, and ban product climate-neutral style claims based on offsetting outside the value chain.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Member State transposition by 2026-03-27; application from 2026-09-27.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Penalties set by national transposition; treated as high legal exposure for claims.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Article 4 deadlines and Annex I additions on generic and offset-based claims.

regulatory_environment.regulation: PAngV Section 4 + Section 20 with WiStrG 1954 Section 3
regulatory_environment.requirement: Consumer offers by weight/volume/length/area require clear unit-price display in addition to total price.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Always-on obligation at point of sale and for price advertising.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Administrative fine up to EUR 25,000 (WiStrG Section 3(2)).
regulatory_environment.source_note: Section 4 requires unit price; Section 20 links violations to WiStrG sanctions.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Register with the central authority before placing filled packaging on market; no sale enablement if manufacturer is not properly registered.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Before first packaging is placed on the German market.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Administrative fines up to EUR 100,000 or EUR 200,000 depending offense.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Section 9 registration and Section 36 penalty framework.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Human-rights and environmental due diligence program for in-scope companies; from 2024 threshold is >=1,000 domestic employees.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Threshold reached and operations in scope.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Fines up to EUR 800,000 and up to 2% global turnover for very large entities.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Section 1 scope threshold and Section 24 sanctions.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Works councils can be elected in establishments with >=5 permanent eligible employees; co-determination applies to scheduling and technical employee-monitoring systems.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Applies once establishment structure and representation conditions exist.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Operational injunction/escalation risk via co-determination disputes.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Section 1 establishment threshold and Section 87(1) nos. 2 and 6 powers.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Daily working time generally max 8 hours; up to 10 only if average returns to 8 within statutory balancing period.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Administrative fines up to EUR 30,000 for key violations.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Section 3 working-time cap and Section 22 penalty provisions.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Employee data processing must be necessary for employment purposes and proportionate; high-penalty GDPR regime applies to unlawful processing.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Always-on for workforce analytics, monitoring, and CRM data handling.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: GDPR administrative fines up to EUR 20m or 4% global turnover (whichever higher).
regulatory_environment.source_note: GDPR Article 83 fine tiers and BDSG Section 26 employee-data conditions.

regulatory_environment.regulation: MiLoG Section 1 + Section 21 and BMAS MiLoV5 update
regulatory_environment.requirement: Pay at least statutory minimum wage; current federal update sets EUR 13.90 from 2026-01-01 and EUR 14.60 from 2027-01-01.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Payroll compliance from each wage-step effective date.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Administrative fines up to EUR 500,000 for key wage-payment violations.
regulatory_environment.source_note: MiLoV5 rates and MiLoG Section 21 sanction levels.

regulatory_environment.requirement: Mandatory food particulars must be presented and available pre-purchase; mandatory food information must appear in language easily understood in market Member State.
regulatory_environment.deadline_or_trigger: Applies to own-label and imported packaged food assortment.
regulatory_environment.maximum_sanction: Enforced via national food-law sanctions and product withdrawal risk.
regulatory_environment.source_note: Article 9 mandatory particulars and Article 15 language rules.

consumer_climate.source: Nuremberg Institute for Market Decisions (NIM), GfK Consumer Climate
consumer_climate.evidence: Jan 28, 2026 release: Consumer Climate indicator expected at -24.1 for Feb 2026.

savings_rate_destatis.evidence: Net savings rate 10.3% (H1 2025); gross savings rate 20.0% (2024).

inflation_forecast.source: European Commission - Economic forecast for Germany

minimum_wage.source: BMAS (Federal Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs)
minimum_wage.evidence: EUR 13.90 from Jan 1, 2026; EUR 14.60 from Jan 1, 2027.

empco_directive.evidence: Transposition by Mar 27, 2026; application from Sep 27, 2026; generic green-claim restrictions.

works_council_codemination.evidence: Co-determination on working-time arrangement and technical monitoring systems.

costco_membership_fee.evidence: US annual membership fee USD 65 for Gold Star and Business memberships.

ehi_discounter_shift.evidence: 2025 release highlights share gains of discounters and price-conscious shopping behavior.

oecd_germany_snapshot.evidence: Growth and inflation outlook for 2026 used for scenario framing.

imf_article_iv_2025.source: IMF Article IV Staff Concluding Statement (Nov 26, 2025)
imf_article_iv_2025.evidence: Downside risk framing for Germany growth and inflation uncertainty.

pangv_unit_price.evidence: Unit price must be displayed clearly with total price for covered goods.

wistrg_pricing_fines.evidence: Pricing-rule offenses can be fined up to EUR 25,000.

verpackg_registration.evidence: Pre-market registration duty and penalty framework up to EUR 100,000 / EUR 200,000.

lksg_scope_and_fines.evidence: Applies from 1,000 employees (2024 step) with sanctions up to EUR 800,000 and 2% turnover.

arbzg_limits.evidence: 8-hour daily cap (10-hour conditional extension) and fines up to EUR 30,000.

gdpr_fine_tiers.evidence: Administrative fines up to EUR 20m or 4% global annual turnover.

bdsg_employee_data.evidence: Employee-data processing must be necessary and proportionate for employment purposes.

eu_food_info_1169.evidence: Mandatory food particulars and market-language requirements for food information.

milog_fines.evidence: Minimum-wage violations can be fined up to EUR 500,000.

marketing_audit.reason: Too vague for high uncertainty-avoidance market norms.

marketing_audit.text: Trusted value for families. Better prices every day.
marketing_audit.reason: Too vague for high uncertainty-avoidance market norms.

marketing_audit.text: Bio oats, 2kg pack, EUR 2.49/kg, ISO 22000 certified, Energy class A, 12-month warranty, DIN EN tested, 15% protein.
marketing_audit.reason: Sufficient concrete detail to reduce perceived purchase risk.

green_audit.label: Climate Neutral household cleaner
green_audit.rule: EmpCo Generic Green Claims Ban (effective Sept 27, 2026)
green_audit.reason: Generic claim(s) ['climate neutral'] without verified ISO certification ID.
green_audit.remediation: Attach verifiable certification ID or remove generic claim language.

green_audit.label: Eco-friendly detergent, ISO 14067 certified
green_audit.reason: No banned generic claim or claim substantiated by ISO ID.

green_audit.label: Green packaging for paper towels
green_audit.rule: EmpCo Generic Green Claims Ban (effective Sept 27, 2026)
green_audit.reason: Generic claim(s) ['green'] without verified ISO certification ID.
green_audit.remediation: Attach verifiable certification ID or remove generic claim language.

green_audit.label: Low-emission logistics detergent ISO 14064-1
green_audit.reason: No banned generic claim or claim substantiated by ISO ID.

workforce_audit.remediation: Increase notice period to >= 4 days and switch to aggregate/non-identifiable KPIs.
Increase notice period to >= 4 days and switch to aggregate/non-identifiable KPIs.
